sect1.title: Root Properties
sect1.para: Root properties are only allowed in the first node of a GSGFGameTree.

sect2.title: GM (Game Type)
sect2.para: The number must be a positive number greater than zero. You can get a list of well-known game types from http://www.red-bean.com/sgf/properties.html#GM.

sect2.title: CA (Charset)
sect2.para: The charset of the SGF file. Note that this will always be the string "UTF-8" because all SGF files are converted to UTF-8 by this library.
